name: 07-Lab-Query a delta table from a serverless SQL pool

properties.description: Query a delta table from a serverless SQL pool

content.query:
-- This demonstrates how you can use a serverless SQL pool to query delta format files that were created using Spark, 
-- and use the results for reporting or analysis.

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/07/delta/products-delta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


-- Observe that you can also use the serverless SQL pool to query Delta Lake data in catalog 
-- tables that are defined the Spark metastore.

USE AdventureWorks;

SELECT * FROM Products;
